H0.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Remoulade

H1.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Aioli

H2.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. BÃ©arnaise

H3.text: Which sauce is made from mayonnaise, chopped capers and onions. Tartare

A4.text: The sauce is made from mayonnaise with vinegar, mustard, shallots, capers, chopped pickles, and/or fresh herbs.

A5.text: Each version may have finely chopped vegetables, usually green onions, celery, and parsley; most are made with either Creole mustard or stone-ground mustard.
